Definition: Given an English language product review, your task is to determine if it is a Good Review or a Bad Review. A good review is one where the product's review has positive tone. A bad review is one where the tone of product's review is negative.

Positive Examples.input: The sound seems really good but sometimes it cuts in and out which is annoying. You have to put the cord directly into your ipod. Other than that, its a simple design with nothing fancy. I love how cheap they were for 10 dollars... But overall nice design... No one can steal me earphones. lol thanks again amazon.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is good because it has positvie tone as the reviewer suggested it really likes the sound and the output is also Good Review.So this example is positive example

Positive Examples.input: My son received this book as a gift. I was extremely disappointed. It is an old book, and the print quality and size are unreadable. At age 4, my 2 year old needs visual help to identify parts of his body at play. Maybe it would be OK for an older child with better sight. But don't waste your time or money. Go buy the new version called "Brain Power--Make Sense Of Opposites" instead.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad because it has negative tone as suggested in the product review that the user is disappointed by the product and the output is also Bad review. So this example is positive example

Negative Examples.input: This is a terrific product. It does exactly as advertised and it was much less expensive here than at the store. Easy to attach & adjust both cameras from one DVR. We are buying 4 more of these for our other cameras. It looks like security personnel will now start to see us more often because they know how easy it is. Only drawback I could possibly come up with is that it's so sturdy we wonder if it needs some sort of tether attached to it. But no - it doesn't.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Good review as there is positive tone in the sentence but it has been output as Bad Review so this example is negative

Negative Examples.input: This thing is so cheap that I had to send it back; don't buy. The screen doesn't reflect anything of it's own size on the wall. It has an extremely light blue hue and looks nothing like any normal light fixture. Not even close to as bright or crisp looking in person & obviously very CHEAP made. Just pay a little more for something better. You will be completely satisfied with this product.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad review as there is negtvie tone in the sentence but it has been output as Good Review so this example is negative

Instances.input: We have had lots of good experience with Cuisinart products. The CS-700 is one such appliance. I was not impressed at all by the quality compared to past products (well built as it is) so we returned it. Perhaps we received a dud -- it's possible some people might like this appliance much better than we did. That being said, there are many features on other models that don't work properly.
The case is too tight and causes some apps to force close, not worth the buy. I won't recommend. Its cheap as in price, would do any good at all in a drop test.

I love this author's first book A Little Bad Magic and this one was a disappointment. The heroine is almost unlikable for the way she handles situations. There were many times when it felt as if everyone around her knew what to expect because they had met her before. How can we forget that in all of their meetings with other witches everything seems perfectly normal except not for her. It always seemed like she deserved whatever trouble came into the next room. She never learned how to take care of herself.

I purchased one for my mother a little over a year ago. The first one died after 3 months. It was used 3-4 times each time it worked then went into eternal hibernate mode, no matter what you did. After about the 5th use that got even worse, and we had to power cycle it constantly. Now it has completely died. What a piece of junk. If you're looking to get an MP3 player, spend half as much money on something that'll die in less than 2 years! 
 Rating: 1.

If there is a better game than this i dont know about it. You can buy it off ebay for under ten bucks. the graphics are as poor as you would expect for such an old game. But that's what games used to be like when computers were first released 20 plus years ago in fact. The story has no plot, and takes about 10 hours of your time just simply walking between each mission at all times. So save yourself some money and pick up something different.

Don't buy this item, its junk. It's cheaply made and I should have seen that the price was to good to. Mine didn't even work. Save you money and buy a better one. If it sounds too good to be true it's definitely not

There is a hole in the bottom. It doesn't hold water for long. My cats didn't care much about it. I had to put it away and bring their old bowl back. Don't waste your money. Mine was not cheap but this one wasn't worth much. Also you need a special cat food that comes with that. Their dry foods are okay as long as they eat. If your cat eats more than that, it isn't good. You can't just buy generic so go with name brands or do some research online.
